thread.title: Ramjas violence: Kiren Rijiju joins Virender Sehwag and Randeep Hooda, hits back at army martyr’s daughter
thread.title_full: Ramjas violence: Kiren Rijiju joins Virender Sehwag and Randeep Hooda, hits back at army martyr’s daughter

author: FE Online
title: Ramjas violence: Kiren Rijiju joins Virender Sehwag and Randeep Hooda, hits back at army martyr’s daughter
text:
Ramjas violence: Kiren Rijiju joins Virender Sehwag and Randeep Hooda, hits back at army martyr’s daughter Ramjas violence: Kiren Rijiju joins Virender Sehwag and Randeep Hooda, hits back at army martyr’s daughter Ramjas violence: Kiren Rijiju said that India never attacked any nation but was always on the receiving end of the hatred. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: February 27, 2017 12:02 PM Ramjas Violence: Gurmehar Kaur posted pictures with messages written on a paper. (Source: Facebook) 
Union Minister Kiren Rijiju has joined the controversy around the daughter of army martyr who lost her father in the Kargil war and took to Twitter to post a picture about it. Minister of State for Home Affairs in Government of India, Kiren Rijiju questioned the girl’s claims that it wasn’t Pakistan but war, that killed her father. Rijiju said that India never attacked any nation but was always on the receiving end of the hatred. 
He posted a tweet saying, “Who’s polluting this young girl’s mind? A strong Arm Force prevents a war. India never attacked anyone but a weak India was always invaded.” He posted a tweet saying, “Who’s polluting this young girl’s mind? A strong Arm Force prevents a war. India never attacked anyone but a weak India was always invaded.” Rijiju also pointed out that so many people take shelter in India because they know there is no better place in the world than here. “Some people say they need Freedom in India. Listen to those people taking shelter in India after facing torture in neighbouring countries,” he added. Who’s polluting this young girl’s mind? A strong Arm Force prevents a war. India never attacked anyone but a weak India was always invaded. http://t.co/gXHkAGi9sh 
— Kiren Rijiju (@KirenRijiju) February 27, 2017 Some people say they need Freedom in India. Listen to those people taking shelter in India after facing torture in neighbouring countries. http://t.co/MDoGYDF1Si
